body: ok who added the netorare tag

The color work is very welcome but the quality check is the bottom of the barrel. Page 3: Left all in Japanese. Page 10: Fixed speech bubbles in first frame but forgot to translate the small text next to them even through it was translated in the first upload. Page 12: fixed the color in the speech bubble of the second frame but for some reason misaligned some part of the first and second frame by one pixel or so. Page 13: Tried to fix the speech bubble color but left some lighter color in the third frame. Page 16: Brought back censoring in the last frame. Fucking why ? Page 23: Brought back censoring in the first frame and some speck of whatever on the last frame. I'm very glad this series is getting a well deserved glow up but if you're gonna do it, do it right. And don't fucking add a random NTR tag in the process.
